descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=5][b]I am giving up Modding Skyrim; ANYONE is free to take and modify my present any way they like; have fun, and good bye![/b][/size][/color]

[color=red][size=6][b]Rezerect Skyrim ENB - Extreme Edition[/b] - [i]Steamin661[/i][/size][/color]
[color=yellow][size=6]AS REAL AS IT GETS[/size][/color]



[i][b]UPDATED 4/7/13[/b][/i]
[i]VERSION: 1.0[/i]: [u][color=yellow] Great Performance (Low FPS Cost), Real Colors for Water and Sky, Packaged with Skyrim Particle Patch, Designed for both: COT and RLO[/u]. [/color]



[size=5][color=yellow]**Requires Climates of Tamriel (COT) and Realistic Lighting Overhaul (RLO)**[/color][/size]



[b][u][i][size=6]!!!MAKE SURE AND READ THE REQUIREMENTS AND INSTALLATION SECTION !!![/u][/b][/i][/size]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8253/8627235524_ddc74789b3_c.jpg[/img]

[color=red][size=3][b][i]PLEASE ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[color=yellow]**SEE BELOW FOR TESTIMONIALS, VIDEOS AND PICTURES**[/color]


[color=teal][size=4][i][b][u]OVERVIEW[/u][/b][/i][/size][/color]

ENB Setting designed around [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel [/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]

Works well with both [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605]Claralux [/url]and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim [/url](I dont recomend using both, as many lights will overlap); as well as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24460]Supreme and Volumetric Fog[/url] (NONE OF THESE MODS ARE NEEDED TO RUN ENB; but add a great amount of value)

For optimal quality, I HIGHLY recomend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801]Texture Pack Combiner[/url]; This will ensure you have the best looking textures possible.


[color=teal][size=4][b][u]FEATURES OF REZERECT SKYRIM ENB - Extreme Edition[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[b][u]Days[/u][/b]: Bright and Vibrant

[b][u]Nights[/u][/b]: Dark and Realistic (Dark Forests are great)

[u][b]Dungeons[/b][/u]: Dark, Creepy and Realistic

[b][u]Interiors[/u][/b]: Warm and Realistic (Feel like you are actually walking through an old castle)

[color=yellow][b][u]ENB Fixes[/u][/b]: This mod comes Packaged with the Skyrim Particle Patch from mindflux; which will fix particle issues caused by ENB (White water, glowing items, etc.). So not only do you get a bitchen ENB, you get a ton of fixes as well![/color]

[u]YOU WILL NEED[/u] a torch or Candellight Spell to adventure; this ENB is not designed to give bright dungeons and nights.

I HIGHLY Recomend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416] Wearable Lanterns[/url]; help to light up the nights and interiors; there is really no reason to adventure without it!!!

**There is an optional \"Letterbox\" File. Download the main file and then the optional file. And Overwrite. Now you have Letterbox, just like the movies :) **


[color=teal][size=4][b][u]ENB SPECS:[/u][/b][/size][/color]

-High Quality Bloom

-Blinding Sun with Godrays Effect

-Realistic Skin, Water, Metals

-Optional Letter Box for a Cinematic Feel

-Rich Vibrant Colors

-SkyEffects: Starts, Moon, Clouds, etc.

-High Quality with Low PC Impact [color=yellow](If you are getting 40+ FPS Pre-ENB, You WILL BE able to run this)[/color]


[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8108/8627235750_ac6ba6f29c_c.jpg[/img]
 

[color=teal][size=4][b][u]REQUIREMENTS AND INSTALLATION[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[i]There is no particular Order of Download and Install[/i]

[size=4]1[/size]. [color=red]ENB v.0.153[/color]: This ENB is based off of what I believe to be the most stable version of ENB; ENBSeries v.0.153; need to download from [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0153.htm]HERE[/url]

-The File will come with two versions: Wrapper and Injector. I recomend using the Wrapper version. If you have issues with this one, use the Injector (Not recomended).

-Copy the d3d9.dll file into your Skyrim Folder (Not the Data Folder)

-Do not copy any of the other files which come with the download, ONLY THE d3d9.dll file



[size=4]2[/size]. [color=red] Download my Mod: Rezerect Skyrim ENB (See download section above)[/color]

-Copy all of the files and drop them in your Skyrim Folder (Same area you put the d3d9.dll file).

-Currently there is only BASE Version Available. If people want a higher quality version, let me know, I can easily up the Quality (SSAO, Shadows, etc.)

 

[size=3]3[/size].[color=red] Download Climates of Tamriel [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]HERE[/url].

    Climates of Tamriel Information:

     - I designed Rezerect Skyrim based around the newest version of Climates of Tamriel (v.3.1):

[color=yellow]Do not download any of the options / settings for COT. All you need is the main file.[/color]



[size=3]4[/size].[color=red] Download Realistic Lighting Overhaul [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450]HERE[/url]; Gives the interiors brand new lighting! Huge transitions between day and night!



[size=4]5[/size].[color=red] Download Revamped Exterior Fog Mod [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930]Here [/url]; pushes the exterior fog back; which gives a crisper look outside.


[size=4][u]OPTIONAL MODS - These are not required, but add a lot of value![/u][/size]


[size=4]OPTION #1[/size].[color=red] Download Lightning during Thunder Storms  [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15506]Here [/url]; It will add actual lighting strikes during thunder storms! MAKE SURE AND GET THE COT PATCH IN THE OPTIONAL FILE SECTION!


[size=4]OPTION #2[/size].[color=red] Download Rainbows [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25666]Here [/url]; It will add rainbows after it rains! Pretty cool!


[size=4]OPTION #3[/size].[color=red] Download Supreme Fog [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24460]Here [/url]; Improves the fog in Skyrim. It also adds morning fogs which sits on top of the water in Skyrim!


[size=4]OPTION #4[/size].[color=red] Download Windy Skyrim [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32723]Here [/url]; Increases the movement / swaying motion of the tree branches / bushes / grass. Goes great with Vurts Flora Overhaul!


[color=yellow][b]NOTICE:[/b] - If you haven\'t already done so, follow the information below:
NOT DOING SO WILL CAUSE UNWANTED COLORING AND LIGHTING

- Make sure you open your SkyrimPrefs.ini; once opened locate and change the following: 

bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 to 1 ----------> (i.e. bFloatPointRenderTarget=1).
bTreesReceiveShadows=0 to 1 ----------> (i.e. bTreesReceiveShadows=1)
bDrawLandShadows=0 to 1 ----------> (i.e. bDrawLandShadows=1)
bShadowsOnGrass=0 to 1 ----------> (i.e. bShadowsOnGrass=1) 

OPTIONAL:
Due to the high Contrast and Brightness during the day, it is possible that the map be very \"bleached out\"; to help with this, try removing the clouds on your map. Do this by opening up your Skyrim.ini and change:

[MapMenu]
sMapCloudNIF=0

If its not there, just add it under Map.[/color]


- If you need more info on installing and using ENB settings, check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23765]SkyRealism\'s ENB Manual[/url], BEST STEP BY STEP GUIDE OUT THERE!!! This is also where I got my start!


[img] http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8116/8627235364_1954cb775b_c.jpg[/img]

[color=teal][size=4][i][b][u]TESTIMONIALS[/u][/b][/i][/size][/color]

[b]e3xplosion[/b]
[i]\"well we have an excellent work here... it is amazing mod thanks man\"[/i]

[b]muradw2[/b]
[i]\"I tested your ENB, I honestly thought it would be a massive performance hit, but it\'s really smooth...\"[/i]


[color=teal][size=4][b][u]VIDEOSHARE OF REZERECT SKYRIM[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[i]COMING SOON[/i]
[i]I am not very good at making videos, so if you want to make one, let me know and I can update with your Video[/i]



[color=teal][size=4][b][u]PHOTOSHARE OF REZERECT SKYRIM[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[i]Please feel free to post your own, I am interested to see what others think[/i]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8239/8626124867_78702d4bb9_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8395/8626125035_2a2fe40dda_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8403/8627235474_06c3d47ef0_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8107/8626125421_f7a2296b11_c.jpg[/img]


[color=teal][size=4][b][u]MODS USED AND SHOWCASED[/u][/b][/size][/color]

TOO MANY TO LIST!!! LOL

Main Mods in Use:

-STEPs: Skyrim Total Enhancement Project

-Climates of Tamriel

-Bella Beautiful Females / Cover Girl

-Crimson Tide

-Supreme and Volumetric Fog

 

[color=teal][size=4][b][u]CREDIT:[/u][/b][/size][/color]

-Bethesda for creating in my opinion, possibly the best game ever made: Skyrim

-Boris Vorontsov for ENB!

-Sharpshooter for his heavy influience in my personal vision of ENB

-IndigoNeko! This guy is BOSS! created the best ENB user manual for the current ENB v0.119; I started off with his base vanilla preset and built from there using ONLY HIS MANUAL. Go give him Credit!
author: steamin661
